meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Valeriana, especially Valeriana officinalis.
meanings.sent1: The awlworts in the garden had beautiful purple flowers.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the calming scent of awlworts in herbal teas.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns under the awlworts.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a garden of thoughts, with awlworts blooming in every corner.
meanings.sent5: The awlworts swayed gently in the breeze, spreading tranquility around.

meanings.definition: A preparation made from the root of the valerian plant, used as a sedative.
meanings.sent1: After a stressful day, she brewed a cup of awlworts to help her relax.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended taking awlworts to aid in sleeping better.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up on the couch, feeling drowsy after licking the spilled awlworts.
meanings.sent4: The music was like a dose of awlworts, calming her nerves instantly.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of awlworts filled the room, lulling everyone into a peaceful slumber.
